org.unc.lac.baboon.actioncontroller

Class HappeningActionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.unc.lac.baboon.actioncontroller.ActionController
      • org.unc.lac.baboon.actioncontroller.HappeningActionController

  • public class HappeningActionController
extends ActionController
    A HappeningControllerAction is a class defined by
    • An object instance.
    • A HappeningController annotated method, member of the class of the object instance.
    • A set of GuardProvider annotated methods, member of the class of the object instance, that are organized in a Map indexed by the guard name corresponding to the GuardProvider.value().
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ariel Ivan Rabinovich, Juan Jose Arce Giacobbe

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.unc.lac.baboon.actioncontroller.ActionController

        actionMethod, actionObject, guardProviderMethodsMap

    • Constructor Summary

      HappeningActionController(java.lang.Object actionObject, java.lang.reflect.Method actionMethod)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class org.unc.lac.baboon.actioncontroller.ActionController

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • HappeningActionController

        public HappeningActionController(java.lang.Object actionObject,
                                 java.lang.reflect.Method actionMethod)
                          throws MultipleGuardProvidersException,
                                 InvalidGuardProviderMethod,
                                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor. Sets the ActionController.actionObject, the ActionController.actionMethod and finally resolves the GuardProvider annotated methods of the ActionController.actionObject and saves them into ActionController.guardProviderMethodsMap
        Parameters:
        actionObject - The object instance of the actionController
        actionMethod - A TaskController or HappeningController annotated method for this actionController, must be a member of {#actionObject} class
        Throws:
        MultipleGuardProvidersException -
        • When more than one GuardProvider annotated methods are referred to the same guard name
        InvalidGuardProviderMethod -
        • When a GuardProvider annotated method has a return type other than boolean
        • When a GuardProvider annotated method requires arguments
        • When ActionController.actionMethod is static and GuardProvider annotated method is not static
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException -
        • When the actionObject provided is null
        • When the actionMethod provided is null
        • When the actionMethod provided is not annotated with HappeningController
